entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
